channel.title: Npc spawn
channel.description: i am working on my first server. i'm up to adding npc's. i tried to add some but after i do, i cant log on to my server. the empty server code i downloaded had a few npc's already in there at the file autospawn.cfg. i add the npc Santa. i fill out the code properly. i run it, i run it, i cant get in my server. it lags. i deleted the Santa code i put in and my server works fine. please give me detailed steps to add npc's

item.title: Npc spawn
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html find how to add npc

Read full topic

item.title: Npc spawn

item.description:
@am159 wrote:

i am working on my first server. i’m up to adding npc’s. i tried to add some but after i do, i cant log on to my server. the empty server code i downloaded had a few npc’s already in there at the file autospawn.cfg. i add the npc Santa. i fill out the code properly. i run it, i run it, i cant get in my server. it lags. i deleted the Santa code i put in and my server works fine. please give me detailed steps to add npc’s
